description: unfortunately app is not responding after installation. just blackscreen. ubuntu 22.04.1
Works great on gnome.

It needs be a moveable and size adjustable "partial" screen blocker.

It's rather the function perform the function than block the screen...
The app is simple and just perfect for me! I have health issues and it helps me to not spend a lot of time in the same position, which has helped me a lot!
Sleek UI, lots of customization options. Just works well.
summary: Perfect way to stop yourself from over-working

description: Lots of options and sleek ui
Nice elegant UI, very customizable. Love the app!
I think it's sleek especially considering the fact that it runs in the background
summary: Awesome app, just what i needed

description:
I've tried alternatives, but I keep coming back to BreakTimer.
It's it's simplicity that makes it great.
I don't have to remember to start a pomodoro cycle, to enter a task , to fill them in advance, it just works.

One thing I wish for, is the ability to save and extract the time spent data.
summary: The best tool to remind you to take breaks without any overhead

description: Just what I was looking for, a simple timer with a great UI.
It haven't short and long break frequency, only one break frequency.

I loved this app at first and had it for a few months. Then my system stopped working and after lots of investigation I found that this app was creating large files on the root causing the system failure. Lots of log file and they were huge. I hardly could recover my system. Be aware and careful with this app!
Been using it on chrome, downloaded the app today, it's great.
summary: Great app to manage break time

description: Lots of options to choose from and it suits in a minimalistic way the purposes of setting timed breaks in a way I couldn't find in any other app (specially nice is the fullscreen popup feature). Still, there are some occasional technical issues when changing the settings for example (had to reinstall the app)
summary: Highly recommend, though some technical issues happen now and then

description: It is simple, it does the job nicely.
Great app. Very helpful in work.

Talking to my eye doctor the other day and I mentioned that after some time on the computer my eyes would not focus. she recommended that every 20 minutes I take a 20 second break. This application works great in reminding me. Using it on UBUNTU 19.0x GNOME
Unobtrusive and great!
Great app, it would be tremendous if the time spent apart from break could be logged automatically

I really love this app, but lately I've been noting that it is requiring much more memory than expected for a little timer app. It may be due to the snap installation, than It generates some error messages at kern.log

[...] apparmor="DENIED" operation="open" profile="snap.breaktimer.breaktimer" [...]


It also generates 6 processes:

 /snap/breaktimer/25/breaktimer --no-sandbox
 /snap/breaktimer/25/breaktimer --type=zygote --no-zygote-sandbox --no-sandbox
 /snap/breaktimer/25/breaktimer --type=zygote --no-sandbox
 /snap/breaktimer/25/breaktimer --type=gpu-process --field-trial-handle=8430627561862716286,11220585471376935668,131072 --enable-features=WebComponentsV0Enabled --disable-features=SpareRendererForSitePerProcess --no-sandbox --gpu-preferences=MAAAAAAAAAAgAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAABgAAAAAAAQAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACAAAAAAAAAA= --shared-files
 /snap/breaktimer/25/breaktimer --type=utility --field-trial-handle=8430627561862716286,11220585471376935668,131072 --enable-features=WebComponentsV0Enabled --disable-features=SpareRendererForSitePerProcess --lang=en-US --service-sandbox-type=network --no-sandbox --shared-files=v8_snapshot_data:100
 /snap/breaktimer/25/breaktimer --type=renderer --no-sandbox --field-trial-handle=8430627561862716286,11220585471376935668,131072 --enable-features=WebComponentsV0Enabled --disable-features=SpareRendererForSitePerProcess --lang=en-US --app-path=/snap/breaktimer/25/resources/app --node-integration --no-sandbox --no-zygote --enable-remote-module --background-color=#fff --enable-spellcheck --enable-websql --disable-electron-site-instance-overrides --num-raster-threads=4 --enable-main-frame-before-activation --renderer-client-id=4 --no-v8-untrusted-code-mitigations --shared-files=v8_snapshot_data:100

If memory is not a limitation for your system, go for it!
So far so good
It helps me to be healthy
summary: It helps me to be healthy

description: I love it and am now able to get 30% more work done! Here's my work tips for taking breaks. Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bUjGZJIgse0
summary: I love it and am now able to get 30% more work done!

description: Also the bug we found on Ubuntu 18 was quickly fixed, thanks!
summary: Helping me a lot with eyes strain. All thanks to the creators!

description:
This app help me take break which i can not make myself during i am spending time on PC
thankful for this useful application from Vietnam
Easy and simple. Does what it says.

randomly i got this applications while searching for reminder task.
really love it. work perfectly
summary: Just a beautiful applications. Love it

description: Cool app to use.
This is like a "passive timer" - it regularly reminds you to take breaks on a schedule. It's not for timing a specific task.

User-friendly interface, smooze work, I was seeking for app like this on linux, though on Windows i didn't find app such like that
Very useful and pleasant

Hi Tom,

This is great software. Is there a full screen mode for the break period?

Pomatez has a good implementation of the full screen mode.

Thank you,
David
I use ~40 min work and ~5 min pause

Love the way it runs in the background and requires no interference from the user, and the way it displays a neat little overlay when it's time to take a break, which also automatically disappears again when the break is over. The interface in general is just perfect. Also love the gong sound!
Customization-wise I really like the snooze settings and being able to define the message it shows during the break.
Exactly what I was looking for
Awesome and much needed app for computers users with so much usage
summary: Awesome and much needed app for computers users with so much usage

description:
Не хватает более гибкой настройки
Например нескольких перерывов большого и малого
Работает без нареканий, использую каждый день, помогает сгонять за чаем.
